features.title: Fast, Friendly Support
features.description: From your first enquiry to event day, our dedicated team responds quickly and clearly to keep everything stress-free.

features.title: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: Need to tweak the start time or swap a cocktail last-minute? We've got you — just let us know up to 48 hours before.

features.title: Stress-Free Setup
features.description: Fast & efficient service, we endeavour to have enough staff at your event to prevent long queues, our team will arrive early to prep providing a smooth service.

features.title: Reliable Vendor Help
features.description: Need catering, DJs or a photographer? We've got a reliable network to complete your event, just ask!

features.title: Top-Tier Mixologists
features.description: Trained in London's best bars, restaurants and clubs, our pros bring both skill and showmanship to your event.

features.title: Always Friendly, Always Ready
features.description: A friendly dedicated team with a positive attitude, always ready to serve your guests & ensure that each visit to the bar is as enjoyable as the last.

features.title: Free Tasting, Full Confidence
features.description: Book our full package and enjoy a complimentary tasting session — perfect your drinks before the big day.

features.title: Tailored Menus, Your Way
features.description: Choose your cocktails, your vibe, and even your start time — we adapt to your event, not the other way around.

features.title: Delicious, Photo-Worthy Drinks
features.description: Every cocktail is crafted with premium liquor and garnishes — because it should taste as good as it looks.

features.title: Add a Theme. Or a Logo. Or Both!
features.description: Add your brand colours, event theme, or even edible logos. From Christmas to Halloween, we help you make it yours.
